Ramhorn/Unitron/Koga Shuko:


Unitron, both laser rifles in hand, stopped next to Koga Shuko, putting a 
laser rifle up against Ramhorn's neck, the other one firing off three bolts 
at Shadow Wing.
"Back off, or the Maxi is dead!  WE MEAN IT!"
